department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: DISPLAY UNITS ln conjunction with the Bell 429 aircraft of lattributed exhibited nveau
description: The given project is to deliver several display units for the Bell 429 aircraft. This project is open only to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for procurement of the T8493-140035 series. The distribution of the RFP documents will be e-mailed directly by the contracting officer to the invitee companies.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Tender Title:** Acquisition of Display Units for Bell 429 Aircraft
**Tender Reference Number:** PW-CAG-010-28810

**Procurement Method:**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is a competitive process that invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the acquisition of display units for the Bell 429 aircraft, which is operated by Transport Canada.

**Supplier Qualification:**
Eligible suppliers must be holders of the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 series or meet the qualification requirements set by the Government of Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
The requirement is to acquire display units with part number 429-375-017-103.

**Submission:**
The RFP will be distributed electronically to qualified suppliers. The Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for distributing the RFP documents.

**Inquiries:**
Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be directed to the Contracting Authority:

Edmond Egikian
Acquisitions Branch, Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector (LAEPSS)
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) / Government of Canada
11 Laurier Street - PDP III, 8C1, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Phone: 343-572-4437
Email: [edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information:**
A Notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronics Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 series. Suppliers interested in becoming Qualified under this arrangement should contact Oliver Morones, Supply Specialist, at oliver.morones@pwgsc.gc.ca or 873-455-5233.

**Closing Date:** The proposal submission deadline is [October 20, 2022, at 14:00 CDT](https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter?iso=20221020T140000&p1=145).
**Response Contact Information:**

Edmond Egikian
Acquisitions Branch, 
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector (LAEPSS)
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) / Government of Canada
11 Laurier Street - PDP III, 8
